snippet: Cut loose from the flash-bang-wallop of the “Captain America” and “Avengers” franchises, Chris Evans seems lost.
abstract: Jeannette Catsoulis reviews movie Playing It Cool, directed by Justin Reardon and starring Michelle Monaghan and Chris Evans.
lead_paragraph: Cut loose from the flash-bang-wallop of the “Captain America” and “Avengers” franchises, Chris Evans seems lost.

headline.main: Review: ‘Playing It Cool,’ with Chris Evans
headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Playing It Cool,’ with Chris Evans
